game.name: PAYDAY 2: Gage Chivalry Pack
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam 트레이딩 카드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Time to explore the art of ancient warfare and get medieval on some asses.The Gage Chivalry Pack is the 28th DLC for PAYDAY 2 and is a collaboration between Torn Banner Studios and OVERKILL! Go medieval on D.C.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Time to explore the art of ancient warfare and get medieval on some asses.The Gage Chivalry Pack is the 28th DLC for PAYDAY 2 and is a collaboration between Torn Banner Studios and OVERKILL! Go medieval on D.C.
